items.content_html:
Decided leave Dolby Atmos in the off state for my iOS devices. For me it lacks clarity (I don‚Äôt have lossless on) when listening with headphones.

I was able to to switch between formats in the iOS settings: Dolby Atmos (Automatic | Off ) to compare without much disruption.
items.content_text:
Decided leave Dolby Atmos in the off state for my iOS devices. For me it lacks clarity (I don‚Äôt have lossless on) when listening with headphones.  

I was able to to switch between formats in the iOS settings: Dolby Atmos (Automatic | Off ) to compare without much disruption.

items.content_html: I do not understand the desire for a dark UI in a well lit environment. Even with matte screens, everything is more susceptible to distracting reflections if the screen is dark.

items.content_html:

Quite surpried to see that it is now Apple Maps.
